review: We LOVE our Apple TV. We had no idea what to expect when ordering it. Our goal was to turn our TV in to a "smart tv" and it worked! We can stream all of our favorite shows from Netflix, HBO go, Hulu and more. There's also a neat option to rent movies from iTunes and they have everything. Before you rent, you can also watch the trailer for free. YouTube is another app we love to use.The coolest thing about this is that we can mirror our iPhones and my MacBook on our tv!!!!! All we had to do was update my MacBooks server.The reason I gave it one less star is that the connection sometimes gets lost. I'm not sure if it's my internet or the product, but I'm pretty sure it's not my internet.We love this product and would recommend it to anyone that lives by Apple products.
